title: RDP session = full screen is not full screen
author: wellloaded
body_snippet:
Sorry for the twisted title but this is essentially what I am trying to say:

There are 2x full screen mode in mRemoteNG

-F11 = no problem and straight forward

-right click on open rdp session tab and select full screen

This latter is in my opinion not behaving as expected. Essentially it goes in full screen but without reconnecting (hence renegotiating the maximum resolution). I would have expected the Full screen toggle for rdp to always trigger an rdp re-connection. Unless there's ...
